description.en:
Jaeshin sees dead people, and Officer Han can sniff out evil. Literally. Their search for a missing friend leads them and professional stuntwoman Yuhyeon into a tangled web of vile cover-ups and twisted violence. Can they handle the overpowering stench of evil?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
description.es:
Jaeshin ve gente muerta, y el oficial Han huele la maldad (literalmente). La búsqueda de un amigo desaparecido los zambulle junto a Yuhyeon, una doble de riesgo, en una intrincada red de mentiras miserables y la más perversa violencia. ¿Podrán disipar el penetrante olor del mal?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
description.id:
Tercium bau busuk dari rumah di lantai bawah sejak kemarin. Setelah itu, temanku tiba-tiba hilang. Penghuni rumah itu juga ikut hilang... selanjutnya siapa lagi?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
description.ko:
며칠 전부터 아랫집에서 썩은 내가 나기 시작했다. 
냄새가 나고 얼마 뒤, 친구가 사라졌다. 그리고 아랫집 누나까지. 그 다음은...? 
사라진 사람들, 그리고 그들을 찾는 사람들의 이야기!

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
description.zh:
突然的恶臭和失踪的朋友，
刺激感官的惊悚力作来了！
几天前，楼下的房间开始传出阵阵恶臭...不久后，朋友失踪，连楼下的女邻居也不见踪影。接下来...会是谁？201号房究竟发生了什么？刺激感官的全新惊悚作品！你，闻到那股臭味了吗？

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
description.zh-hk:
幾天前，樓下的套房開始傳出陣陣惡臭... 不久後，朋友失蹤，連樓下的女房客也不見縱影。接下來…會是誰？ 刺激感官的全新驚悚作品！你，聞到那股臭味了嗎？

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
